title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday July 21, 2014
teaser: The sports network’s ESPN 3 will carry a $10 million gaming contest this weekend in Seattle. We investigate. Plus, a report by Bankrate says young people favor saving cash over investing in the stock market. We examine the issue.
byline: Leoneda Inge, Lizzie O'Leary, Dan Bobkoff, Rob Schmitz, Mark Garrison, Tracey Samuelson, David Brancaccio and Rowan Moore Gerety
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday July 21, 2014
description: The sports network’s ESPN 3 will carry a $10 million gaming contest this weekend in Seattle. We investigate. Plus, a report by Bankrate says young people favor saving cash over investing in the stock market. We examine the issue.
